name: Ladder Room
longDesc: You are in a room with a ladder going up into darkness. You look up the shaft and cannot see any light coming from above. The air coming down the shaft smells slightly fresher than the previous room and... is that a hint of coffee? There is a wooden door to the West.
shortDesc: You are in a room with a ladder going up into darkness. The air coming down the shaft smells slightly fresher than the previous room and... is that a hint of coffee? There is a wooden door to the West.
feat1desc: A ladder that leads up into darkness.
feat1interactSuccess: You look more closely at the ladder. It's a metal ladder that is bolted to the wall. At least it looks pretty sturdy.
feat1interactComplete: A sturdy looking metal ladder that leads up into darkness.
feat1interactFail: Ladder Fail - this should never display
feat2desc: A plain wooden door.  It's plainness has a certain charm to it.
feat2interactSuccess: You try the handle on the somewhat charmingly plain wooden door. It's unlocked!
feat2interactComplete: An unlocked plain wooden door.  It's plainness has a certain charm to it.
feat2interactFail: Wooden Door Fail - this should never display
